document_data.name: ''Wand of Negation''
document_data.mainbody: A '''''wand of negation''''' was a [[magic item]] that cancelled the effects of [[spell]]s and other magic items.
document_data.Powers: These [[wand]]s negated the powers of certain spells and magic items. A pale beam of light would shoot from the wand when pointed at the desired target. There was a 75% chance that the targeted item would fail when used. Each use of a ''wand of negation'' expended a single charge. These wands could not be recharged.
document_data.Notable Owners:
* [[Chantos Graybeard|Chantos Greybeard]] owned a ''wand of negation''.
* [[Durissa Thornion]], an [[illusionist]] from [[Chondath]], carried a ''wand of negation''.
